name: Craft your beat! (iozsaygi)
description:
Craft your beat! is a sandbox which you can generate random drum beats by dashing through circles. The game supports gamepad and keyboard/mouse control schemes.

Features
  • Randomly generated drum beats.
  • Gamepad support.
  • Highscore and statistics tracking.
Controls (Keyboard & Mouse)
  • Use W, A, S, D and arrow keys for movement.
  • Use LMB or Enter to dash through circles and generate drum beats.
  • Use ESC to pause the game.
Controls (Gamepad)
  • Use left analog for movement.
  • Use Y or triangle to dash through circles and generate drum beats.
  • Use B or circle to pause the game.
Clearing existing gameplay data

If you wish to reset your progress unfortunately the game has no built in support for that. However, there is a workaround for this. You can delete the related .xml files to reset your progress.

Windows

  • Type %appdata% to Windows search bar.
  • Go to the LocalLow folder and head inside to the IsmailOzsaygi /Crafty your beat!/Data folder.
  • Delete the existing PlayerProgress.xml file and restart the game.

Craft your beat! is developed in a week by using Unity Engine.
